channel.title: Teleporting
channel.description: how do i use the emote tab to tele people to another location? and also: how do i get when ::prayer is typed in to take you to a prayer place?

item.title: Teleporting
item.dc:creator: @am159 am159
item.description:
@am159 wrote:

yea, your right. i have another question, how do i increase the amount of xp you get from hitting dummies? i think i know how but i just wanna check

Read full topic

item.title: Teleporting
item.dc:creator: @R4ND0M R4ND0M
item.description:
@R4ND0M wrote:

search for this in your client.java file:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Home"))

you dont have to have “home” there.

under that command (where it satrts to say, “else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase”, put this.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("prayer")) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { teleportToX = X coordinate where you want to go; teleportToY = Y coordinate where you want to go; sendMessage("You teleport to the prayer area."); } }

then, compile, and it should work

Read full topic
